articles.title: Geophysicist's book 'The Next Supercontinent' envisions North America and Asia colliding in distant future - The Economic Times
articles.description: Ross Mitchell takes readers on a captivating journey through remote and occasionally perilous lands in search of evidence of ancient supercontinents. He explores the fascinating phenomena that will give rise to the next supercontinent and present a compelling…
articles.content: Geophysicist Ross Mitchell takes readers on an extraordinary journey in "The Next Supercontinent," a captivating book that delves into the distant future when Earth's continents merge into a single l… [+3058 chars]
